channel.title: multiple task on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in multiple task on Codetab

item.title: Multiple Tasks - Gotz ETL - CodeTab
item.description: We can define multiple task for tasks and also, multiple tasks are allowed in a job file. The Example-1 scrapes Price data from acme-quote.html page while Example-2 extracts Snapshot data from the same page. We can add these two task within tasks element. But before doing that let’s introduce one more feature - steps reference - which extracts steps into separate entity which can be used by both tasks.   (adsbygoogle = window.
